detaileddescription.para: Traceability - SWR and SWDD No requirements Traceability - SWA and SWDD This package uses partially the achitecture from CanTpFd. We are refering here to the dispatching part from Routing Engine. Traceability - SWDD and Implementation The traceability between SWDD and implementation is established by using identical sw unit names (in SWDD and implementation).
